reason: Minor inconsistency: Prover's script has contradictory C_n(ta) formulas -- line 20 comment says -4/(n^2*(n-1)) while line 312 compute_R_n uses -4/(n*(n-1)). The correct C_n(ta) is -4/(n*(n-1)), and line 312 is right. The C_n(their) = 4/(n^2*(n-1)) claim IS correct. This does not affect any results. See verifier10b_report.md.
